resolution.description: The resolution of the video, only these values are allowed: 480p (use this option unless user asked to user another resolution), 720p, 1080p. Note that if has both param first_frame_image_name and last_frame_image_name, the resolution should be 480p and 720p.

duration.description: The duration of the video in seconds, only these values are allowed: 5, 10.

camerafixed.description: Whether to control the camera not moved.

first_frame_image_name.description: The name of the image to control as the first frame.

last_frame_image_name.description: The name of the image to control as the last frame.

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the video, only these values are allowed: 1:1, 16:9, 4:3, 3:4, 9:16.
